players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Diana is dead. I investigated Alice last night and found she is the mafioso."
Charlie: "Bob, why investigate Alice? Diana was the detective. Mafia killed her to frame or mislead. Let's discuss."
You: "Bob is lying. I am the detective and investigated Diana last night, she was the mafioso. He's trying to frame me to save himself."
Bob: "Alice is lying. I am the detective, and I investigated Alice last night. She is the mafioso. Diana was a villager."
You: "Bob is the only one claiming detective. I investigated Diana and found mafia. He's trying to confuse us. Vote Bob to save the town."
Charlie: "Alice, if you're the detective, why investigate Diana? She was killed N1, so she couldn't be mafia. Your story doesn't add up."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
